{"id":351568007,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 10 months","timestamp":1591762995,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/351568007/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        unordered_map<char, int> last_seen; \n        int lower_bound = 0; \n        int max_len = 0; \n        for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); ++i) {\n            auto it = last_seen.find(s[i]); \n            if (it == last_seen.end()) {\n                last_seen[s[i]] = i; \n            } else {\n                if (it -> second >= lower_bound) {\n                    lower_bound = it -> second + 1; \n                }\n                it -> second = i; \n            }\n            max_len = max(i - lower_bound + 1, max_len); \n        }\n        return max_len; \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
